Room.Name: Green Knight's Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an arena draped with green banners, awaiting your test.
Room.LongDescription: You have shown you are willing to fight against evil by advancing as far as you have, but now you must challenge the Green Knight to serve at a higher level. If your heart is pure, and your love of God is great, than no matter how hard the Green Knight tries, you will prevail. Good luck, mighty paladin.
